description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Mambow and Piou to conquer their independence in an incredible 3D platform game. Collect 50 medals distributed in savanna, jungle, mountain and temple.  10 levels to go for maximum challenge !
